name: sales-tracker-server
description: Backend server for Sales Tracker Application

scripts.postinstall: node node_modules/puppeteer/install.mjs || npx puppeteer browsers install chrome || echo 'Puppeteer install skipped'
scripts.db:create: psql -U ${PG_USER:-postgres} -c 'CREATE DATABASE ${PG_DATABASE:-sales_tracker};' || echo 'Database may already exist'
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:setup && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:init: npm run db:create && npm run db:reset
